programme.title: The Sunday Morning Slasher
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E11, Law enforcement officials fear they may have to release a serial killer from prison until a 24-year-old murder case gives them a chance to lock him up for good.

programme.title: Killer on Campus / The Bow Hunter
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E15, Thirty-two years after the killing of University of Michigan law student Jane Mixer, police use DNA found on her pantyhose to finally track down the killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E20, DNA found on a marijuana joint in Florida in 2005 helps to solve the 1988 rape and murder of a California woman. And a cold case of murder in Illinois heats up when a jailhouse lawyer turns jailhouse snitch.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E21, Detectives are baffled when two young girls are raped, murdered, and dumped in an abandoned house in Akron, Ohio. And a 26-year-old mother of three disappears on Christmas Eve in 1995, but the missing person case goes cold when police can find few clues

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E22, The killing of a woman in a VA goes unsolved for a quarter of a century before investigators are finally able to zero in on the likely killer. And, in 1999 detectives test the blood evidence and develop a DNA profile of a shooting death from 1980.

programme.title: The Black Dahlia
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S06E06, Bill Kurtis examines one of the most infamous cold cases in Los Angeles history.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S09E02, The murder of an Ohio woman in 1974 is solved more than 20 years later after police get a crucial clue--the woman's husband was seen building a coffin-shaped box about the time the woman disappeared.

programme.title: The Voice In The Lake
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E01, When 31-year-old real estate appraiser Mike Williams mysteriously vanishes while duck hunting in the Florida swamps in December of 2000, authorities suspect he accidentally drowned. For sixteen years his disappearance remains a mystery.

programme.title: Devil At The Door
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E02, When 36-year-old computer programmer Lisa Valdez fails to show up for work, her apartment manager finds her brutally murdered. Detectives ask, could she be the victim of a brutal serial killer? Or was Lisa murdered by someone she knew?

programme.title: Missing in Altoona
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E03, When Sherry Leighty goes missing in 1999, her family is left wondering how a dedicated mother of three could vanish without a trace. A decade later, the cold case heats up when Sherry's sister launches a social media campaign.

programme.title: The School Teacher
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E04, When 25-year-old school teacher Christy Mirack is found murdered in her apartment in 1992, there is no shortage of suspects.

programme.title: The Heartland Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E05, In the 1980s, a suspected serial killer preyed on women in small towns located on the banks of the Mississippi River until the murders abruptly ceased and went unsolved.

programme.title: Devil In Disguise
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E06, A 23-year-old teacher vanished the evening before Easter after giving confession. Her body was later found floating in a drainage canal. At the time, a key witness hinted that a member of the Catholic clergy may have been responsible.

programme.title: Love and Hate
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E07, Near what's known as the hanging tree, the mutilated body of Timothy Coggins is found in late 1983. The investigation is thwarted and the case freezes for over 30 years, until a newly elected sheriff vows to bring the killers to justice.

programme.title: Ice Cold in Denver
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E08, On a bitter morning in 1980, radio intern Helene Pruszynski is found brutalized in a snowy field. After 37 years of fruitless leads, investigators tap into a genealogy website that gives them a lead.

programme.title: Murder by Moonlight
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E09, Easter Sunday of 1992, the body of missing woman Lisa Ziegert is found in a field. The investigation yields hundreds of leads but no true suspect. After more than two decades on ice, the case is revived.

programme.title: Suspicious Minds
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E10, In 1984, a 15-year-old girl is found murdered in her grandparents' home. For decades, a stalled investigation only fuels the town rumor mill, pointing an accusing finger at her 13-year-old sister.
MST3K: The Mask, 20221028000000 +0000, For MST3K's first-ever Halloween episode, Jonah's crew watch THE MASK (1961) in 3D! Jonah teaches the bots about Halloween.
MST3K: The Creeping Terror, 19940917000000 +0000, Mike and the 'bots watch The Creeping Terror (1964), with its infamous walking-carpet monster, and parody Love, American Style (1969).

programme.title: What to Do on a Date
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S01E108, Nick wants to take Kay out on a date, but isn't sure what they'd do. The short offers ideas like taffy pulls and scavenger sales. Nothing says romantic quite like a scavenger sale.
MST3K: Pod People, 19910615000000 +0000, A child adopts a large egg which hatches into a mischievous alien, while a group of pop musicians on a wilderness vacation runs into trouble.

MST3K: Viking Women And The Sea Serpent, 19911026000000 +0000, The crew watches an educational short about the wonders a home economics major can do for young women in The Home Economics Story (1951). In The Saga of the Viking Women Sea Serpent (1957), lonely Viking women set sail to rescue a group of enslaved men.

MST3K: Stranded In Space, 19910629000000 +0000, The gang on the SoL have a gag-weapon war with the Mads and watch an unsuccessful TV pilot about an astronaut stuck on an Earth-like planet where ;perfect order; rules.

programme.title: The Sword And The Dragon
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Sword And The Dragon, S06E17, A Russian hero plots an invasion against the Mongols in The Sword and the Dragon. Mike and the Bots create their own topical comedy show, reenact the table cloth scene from the movie, and try their hand at playing Dungeons and Dragons.

programme.title: The Rebel Set
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Rebel Set, S04E19, Three coffee shop customers help an owner rob an armored car.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Keeping Clean And Neat
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E21, Don't leave the house before watching this indispensable guide to hygiene.

programme.title: King Dinosaur
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: King Dinosaur, S02E10, In King Dinosaur, the crew pokes fun as scientists are terrorized by snakes, bugs, and dinosaurs on a newly discovered planet.

programme.title: Rocket Attack U.S.A.
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Rocket Attack U.S.A., S02E05, The crew watches the second chapter of The Phantom Creeps and a film about an American spy sent to the Soviet Union to investigate a missile attack. Joel hosts a quiz show with the Bots.
Nearlyweds, 20130112000000 +0000, Complications arise when three women (Danielle Panabaker, Jessica Parker Kennedy) learn that their marriages are not official.

Kitten Bowl IV, 20170205000000 +0000, The two Feline Football League teams that have cuddled and clawed their way to the top are set to go paw to paw to find out who will win the championship. Hosted by Beth Stern, John Sterling and Mary Carillo.

programme.title: With This Ring
programme.desc: Good Witch, S04E01, Hallmark Original Series. Abigail helps Sam search for the perfect engagement ring for Cassie.

programme.title: In 4/4, with Emotion
programme.desc: Good Witch, S04E02, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie and Sam learn to communicate about their future together.

programme.title: Daddy's Home
programme.desc: Good Witch, S04E03, Hallmark Original Series. Grace is forced to think about her future.

programme.title: Family Time
programme.desc: Good Witch, S04E04, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie faces a few obstacles before they start acting like a family again.

programme.title: Written Like a Merriwick
programme.desc: Good Witch, S04E05, Hallmark Original Series. Grace finds herself under the spell of Elizabeth Merriwick.

programme.title: Match Game
programme.desc: Good Witch, S04E06, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie and Sam play detective matchmaker.
When Calls the Heart, 20130101000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Maggie Grace stars as Elizabeth Thatcher, a cultured young teacher in 1910.

When Love Is Not Enough: The Lois Wilson Story, 20100425000000 +0000, Based on the true story of the enduring but troubled love between Lois Wilson, co-founder of Al-Anon, and her alcoholic husband Bill Wilson, co-founder of Alcoholics Anonymous. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

Kiss at Pine Lake, 20120519000000 +0000, Luke Garvey buys his uncle's Camp Pine Lake only to find himself the owner of a sinking business. Zoe McConnell, Luke's girlfriend from years ago, wants him to sell until an old flame is rekindled.

Plainsong, 20040325000000 +0000, Tom, a high school history teacher, is faced with raising two young sons after his wife leaves him. Maggie, a fellow teacher, tries to provide comfort and support. Gradually, they grow to need and depend on each other.

programme.title: Time
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E08, After making a surprising discovery on a jungle planet, members of the team become ill. In an attempt to isolate the infection, the team sets up camp in the jungle. But when night falls, the illness will be the least of their worries.

programme.title: Cold Lazarus
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E07, A strange crystal strikes down O'Neill, replacing him with a double that returns with the team to Earth to find the cause of O'Neill's private grief...his son's death. But the double is dangerously unstable. Can O'Neill return home to save everyone?

programme.title: The Nox
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E08, When a planned ambush goes disastrously wrong, resulting in fatalities among the SG-1 team, the peace-loving Nox restore them to life. But while these gentle people can bring back the dead, can they resist the deadly technology of the Goa'uld?

programme.title: Brief Candle
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E09, On the mysterious planet Argos, the beautiful Kynthia seduces Colonel Jack O'Neill, which means he's condemned to an Argosian lifespan of only a hundred days. As he turns gray, will his team succeed in their frantic search for a cure?

programme.title: Thor's Hammer
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E10, Looking for allies against the Goa'uld, the SG-1 team lands on Cimmeria, home of the legendary Norse gods. Teal'c and O'Neill are transported to an underground labyrinth of caves of the vicious creature Unas. Can Carter & Daniel rescue them?

programme.title: The Torment Of Tantalus
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E11, Dr. Daniel Jackson discovers that in 1945, a young professor slipped through the Stargate, never to return. Together with his still living fiancée, the SG-1 team discovers the now aged professor trapped in a decaying fortress.

programme.title: Bloodlines
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E12, With the proviso that he bring back a Goa'uld larva for study, Teal'c (Christopher Judge) returns to Chulak to stop the Goa'uld from enslaving his son Rya'c. Trouble is, Rya'c needs a larva to survive - and the only one available is Teal'c's.

programme.title: Fire And Water
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E13, The SG-1 team returns from the planet Oannes in a panic and minus Daniel Jackson, who was last seen being consumed by a column of flames. But as his comrades mourn him on Earth, Daniel is the captive of an amphibious humanoid creature known as Nem.

programme.title: Hathor
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E14, The evil Goa'uld Hathor (Suanne Braun) escapes from a Mayan pyramid in Mexico. At the Stargate facility, she uses her charms to seduce the men into helping her take over the world. Can Samantha Carter and her female colleagues defeat her?

programme.title: Singularity
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E15, Capt. Carter returns with the sole survivor of a planetary plague - a little girl, Cassandra. As they become attached, Carter discovers the girl's terrible secret - a time bomb implanted by the Goa'uld. Can she save the girl - and the world?

programme.title: Cor-Ai
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E16, Colonel Jack O'Neill and the team travel to Chartago, where Teal'c is recognized as once having been head Jaffa to the sinister Goa'uld Apothis. He's arrested for murder and put on trial for his life. Can his comrades save him?

programme.title: Enigma
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E17, The SG-1 team rescues a group of highly developed survivors from the cataclysmic planet of Tollan. To stop the legendary knowledge of the Tollan people from falling into the wrong hands, O'Neill and his team stake all on the cross-universal rescue.

programme.title: Solitudes
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E18, Following a Stargate technical defect, O'Neill and Carter find themselves stranded on an icy wasteland. O'Neill is severely wounded, both are freezing to death, and nobody can find the section of the universe in which they are stranded!

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E09, Upon arriving at a new planet, M5S-224, the team discovers that they can gate back to Earth. The team sets out, with the intention of returning thanks to a new hyperdrive. But when the engines suddenly explode, the team deals with a new situation.

programme.title: The Storm
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E10, Sheppard and Teyla discover that a massive storm is approaching the city. The team must evacuate the city, and the Manarians offer to give them shelter. As they work to figure out a way to power up the shield, the city is invaded by the Genii.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E11, Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) plays a dangerous game of cat and mouse as he attempts to regain control of Atlantis from the Genii, who have taken the city along with Weir (Torri Higginson) and McKay (David Hewlett) hostage.

programme.title: The Defiant One
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E12, Sheppard and McKay set out, along with two scientists, to explore when they stumble upon a distress beacon coming from a Wraith ship. When they move to investigate, they discover that the ship has been sending out it's SOS signal for 10,000 years.

programme.title: Greek To Me
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E004, It is rush week on campus. Now on the staff of the campus radio station, David and Donna man the graveyard shift.

programme.title: Radio Daze
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E005, Dylan finds Kelly with another guy. Donna is offered a daytime slot at the radio station, which causes problems with David. Andrea plans a date with her English teacher.

programme.title: Strangers in the Night
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E006, Kelly recommends that she and Dylan see other people. Mr. Walsh sets Brenda up on a blind date with his client's son.

programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E009, Brenda and Stuart argue about the details of their marriage. Lucinda has unsettling news for Brandon.

programme.title: And I Did It...My Way

programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E011, Laura threatens to label Steve as a date rapist at a campus rally. He loses Celeste when he confesses his indiscretion.

programme.title: Radar Love

programme.title: Emily

programme.title: Windstruck
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E014, Donna and David celebrate their first year together. Dylan and Kelly get back together, while Andrea falls in love with a new boyfriend.

programme.title: Crunch Time
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E016, Steve has trouble at the fraternity house and David relies on drugs to keep himself awake through finals week.

programme.title: Thicker Than Water
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E017, Kelly asks David if he is using drugs and Andrea gets surprising news from the doctor's office.

programme.title: Heartbreaker
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E018, David has his first session with a psychologist and Andrea realizes her pregnancy will affect her educational plans.

programme.title: The Labors of Love
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E019, Andrea decides to have an abortion and Nat has surgery.

programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E337, A police dog is wounded while helping apprehend a suspect. A man is trapped under a truck he had been repairing.

programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E102, A mother leaves babies strapped in a car that accidentally rolls into water. An unconscious man is laying on subway tracks.

programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E182, Jockey is injured when his horse takes a spill. Rescue 911 is on-scene at Tucson's Victim Witness Crisis Unit.

However, while staying at a mental health facility for depression, Celeste tries to convince a fellow patient to kill her husband for the money.
Secrets of an Undercover Wife, 20240630080400 +0000, A newlywed searches for answers after the arrest of her husband for murder and embezzlement.
Holly's Holiday, 20121231000000 +0000, Ad exec Holly sells perfection. But when she gets a chance for her own Christmas fantasy, it turns out perfection might not be perfect after all.

Lacy's Christmas Do-Over, 20211210000000 +0000, Lacy is a businesswoman disgruntled in the holidays. A mysterious therapist tells Lacy to go to a B&B in Illinois. There she finds herself reliving the same day. Now she must escape this Christmas time warp and find the answers she is looking for.
Merry Single Christmas, 20221122000000 +0000, Morgan escapes to a single's retreat to rekindle her Christmas spirit, but things get complicated when her Ex, Liam, shows up.

My Best Friend's Christmas, 20191201000000 +0000, When Ashley’s plans to reconnect with her high school sweetheart over Christmas fails, she and her best friend Liam decide to fake their own romance. But as her feelings start to turn real, Ashley will have to decide what her heart really wants.
Naughty & Nice, 20131231000000 +0000, A cynical city DJ is exiled to a remote radio station where small-town charm, holiday cheer, and his pretty co-host begin to melt his icy demeanor.

Santa Girl, 20190830000000 +0000, Santa Claus’ only daughter wants to experience the “real world” before she must marry the son of Jack Frost and take over the family business. Cassie Claus sets off to college while trying to keep her famous father a secret.

Small Town Santa, 20140101000000 +0000, A small town sheriff (Cain) and his K9 partner arrest an apparent burglar dressed as Santa Claus. He comes to discover that the man truly is Santa Claus as the prisoner reunites the Sheriff with his daughter and introduces him to a new love!

The 12 Dogs of Christmas, 20050101000000 +0000, A widowed father sends his daughter to stay with her aunt in a town that has outlawed dogs. When she decides to keep a stray puppy, she is inspired to help the dogs and charm the mayor with the most memorable Christmas pageant ever.
The Case of the Christmas Diamond, 20221120000000 +0000, A woman is accused of stealing a gem and seeks to find the culprit amid a litany of wealthy guests.

Christmas in the Heartland, 20171113000000 +0000, Kara and Jessie strike up an unlikely friendship when seated next to each other on a plane headed to the heartland. With both girls visiting family they've never met, they devise a plan to switch places for Christmas.

Godzilla vs. Destoroyah, 19951209000000 +0000, With a super-charged blast from his nuclear past, a new Godzilla® emerges from his own ashes, radioactive and ready to take on Tokyo! The great lizard's nuclear energy is increasing by the minute, and a monster meltdown threatens to vaporize the planet.

Rebirth of Mothra, 19961214000000 +0000, When the three-headed Death Ghidorah, an even fiercer cousin of King Ghidorah, begins to destroy the forests of Japan, Mothra, one of Godzilla's longtime allies (and sometimes foe), leaves her island paradise to help save them.

Rebirth of Mothra 2, 19971213000000 +0000, Two young kids inadvertently unleash a giant sea creature which is strengthened from the abundance of modern-day pollution. Mothra's keepers, the tiny twins Moll and Lora, quickly rouse the gentle giant in order to combat this latest threat to peace.

Rebirth of Mothra 3, 19981212000000 +0000, In the final film in the new 'Mothra' trilogy, King Ghidorah, the most destructive of all the monsters, returns to destroy the Earth. In the end, Mothra is indeed triumphant and takes her place among the greatest of all monsters.

Godzilla Vs. Megaguirus: The G Annihilation Strategy, 20001216000000 +0000, Five years after Godzilla® terrorized the city of Osaka, Japanese scientists have developed a sure-fire way to finally destroy Japan's monster nemesis. They have created the world's first man-made black hole, which will trap Godzilla® for eternity!

Godzilla, Mothra, and King Ghidorah: Giant Monsters All-Out Attack, 20011215000000 +0000, When a series of terrifying natural disasters begin to plague Japan, including the inexplicable offshore sinking of a U.S. submarine, a mystic old man warns his nation that Godzilla has come back to destroy Japan.

Godzilla Against Mechagodzilla, 20021214000000 +0000, After four years of scrupulous preparation under the prime minister, a new invincible robot, Mechagodzilla, has now reached completion, armed with various weapons, including the most powerful gun in history.

Godzilla: Tokyo S.O.S., 20041214000000 +0000, Mechagodzilla, the superior-armed, state-of-the-art, all-robot version of Godzilla, is undergoing repairs after his devastating battle against the world's monsters.

programme.title: The Chamber
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E17, Mitch has an out-of-body experience when his attempt to save a trapped diver without scuba gear leaves him with the bends, dangerously close to death and in desperate need of a decompression chamber.

programme.title: Shark's Cove
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E18, Shauni is suspicious when a swimmer training for the Olympics disappears in "Shark's Cove.” Eddie's world is turned upside-down when he is reunited with his schizophrenic half-brother.

programme.title: The Lost Treasure of Tower 12
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E19, A bohemian poet flirts with Shauni, and with danger when he uses his metal detector to find the buried stash of two jewel thieves.

programme.title: The Big Spill
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E20, Mitch helps a former lifeguard, Lane Brody, investigate a corporation suspected of dumping deadly chemicals in the bay.

programme.title: Game of Chance
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E21, Harvey and Mitch go to play poker on an offshore yacht where they are robbed by a masked man that drives an amphibious Jeep. Shauni invites Eddie over for dinner at her parents’ house where her snobbish father strongly disapproves of him.

programme.title: Summer of '85
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E22, Shauni and Eddie visit a local fortune teller who predicts that Eddie will soon meet his first true love. Shauni thought he already had, and that it was her! But it's Lorna, an older woman Eddie had a "Summer of '42" affair with as a teenager.

programme.title: River of No Return, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E01, The mysterious death of Mitch's uncle and the cryptic will he left, finds Mitch, Hobie, Eddie, and Shauni on a whitewater rafting adventure. Meanwhile, rookie lifeguard hopefuls participate in the annual qualifying swim.

programme.title: River of No Return, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E02, A whitewater rafting trip turns deadly when Mitch, Hobie, Eddie, Shauni and CJ are pursued by the murderous miners that killed Mitch's uncle to get his map leading to the "Golden Boot" that Mitch and the others are now searching for.

programme.title: Tequila Bay
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E03, Jimmy Slade and Matt Brody tangle with a violent surf gang, while Mitch's life is thrown into turmoil when former lover Stephanie Holden assumes co-command of Baywatch headquarters.

programme.title: Rookie of the Year
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E04, Summer and Matt face grueling personal and physical challenges in Rookie School, the "boot camp” of lifeguarding, while unusual circumstances force female odd couple CJ and Stephanie to share an apartment.

programme.title: Pier Pressure
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E05, Hobie and Summer each find themselves torn between doing the right thing and giving in to dangerous social pressures.

programme.title: Showdown at Malibu Beach High
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E06, Malibu Beach High students square off against the administration's plans to sell sacred Chumash Indian lands. And Garner quits the beach to work as a street cop again, only to be stuck in an office job by his vindictive captain.

programme.title: Point Doom
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E07, Matt's tempestuous affair with a gorgeous motorcycle racer takes him to the brink, while Mitch and Stephanie go head-to-head in a spirited battle of the sexes.

programme.title: Princess of Tides
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E08, A thrilling muscle boat competition is the backdrop for a whirlwind romance between Mitch and a beautiful woman he doesn't know is both a princess and the target of an assassination plot.

programme.title: Masquerade
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E09, Mitch and Stephanie board a yacht disguised as wealthy southern honeymooners to capture a group of modern-day pirates and find themselves oddly attracted to each other's undercover character.

programme.title: Lifeguards Can't Jump
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E10, Mitch and Garner go undercover as a two-on-two street basketball team to solve a young athlete's murder. CJ becomes involved with an amorous, honeymooning Midwestern tourist.

programme.title: Dead of Summer
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E11, A rock concert and political rally are the backdrop for a chilling assassination plot that finds CJ unconscious on an explosive-laden Scarab heading for the crowded pier.
